description: This file defines the `MockTimeCluster` class, which extends `MockCluster` and represents a mock implementation of a 'time' cluster for testing or simulation purposes within a Zigbee or similar device framework.

classes.name: MockTimeCluster
classes.description: A mock cluster representing the 'time' functionality for testing or simulation, extending the base MockCluster class.

methods.name: MockTimeCluster
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the mock time cluster with an EUI-64 address, endpoint ID, and server/client role.
